name: DFO or Bust
description:
CONTROLS:  Z = A   X = B  Enter = Start Shift = Select  WASD or Arrow Keys to move

A brand new Gameboy game!

DFO or Bust is an adventure RPG that gives the real life experience of waking up late, buying supplies, and making real heady glass pipes!

Find your homies and grab your tickets on this incredible adventure across Shakedown St.

Special thanks to the patrons and many friends and family that helped with this project.

This game was made for the DFO event on May 20th 2022 in Portland Oregon.

Thanks to GB Studio and Deer Tears for the Game engine and Music,

To purchase a physical Game Cartridge please contact me at @KnucklesGlass on Instagram. Thanks for playing!
